page.title: 04LOWER SPARGO FARM,TREVERVA
page.content: One of the farms in the area was Lower Spargo Farm.The owner of the farm is Mr.Ross Young.His father lives across the road so he can help him with the farming.He also has a son who helps him,usually driving the tractor. Mr.Young has a mixed farm (dairying and pigs) and he has 180 acres. On his farm he allows the pitching of tents and if they pay breakfast is available All his milk products are taken to market boards in Camborne.And pigs go to J.V.Richards, Frog pool.He has gold milk tops(Jersey). The family on the farm goes back to 40 years,back to his step father.
